snippet.title: Supremacy: Battle Arena Trailer 🦾🦾
snippet.description:
The Battle Arena is a 24/7 interactive play-to-earn AND watch-to-earn browser game. Earn $SUPS and use them to influence the battle in your favor, or cash them out for ETH. Full gameplay trailer coming soon...
► Join the fight for glory at https://supremacy.game/
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Supremacy is a series of metaverse-enabled games based on Earth in the year 2149, consisting of different game platforms that simulate different parts of the metaverse:
► Action (play through combat, resource management, player management and traditional game mechanics).
► Economy (work by playing in a near-realistic economic simulation).
► Entertainment (play via spectator-voting mechanisms).
► Utility (make bank via play-to-earn systems).
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SupremacyMeta
Discord: https://discord.gg/supremacygame
Telegram: https://t.me/SupremacyMeta
Everything else: https://linktr.ee/supremacygame
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
#Supremacy #Metaverse #SupremacyGame
